suggest.symfony/translation: If you want to use Symfony2 translations adapter
suggest.symfony/yaml: If you want to parse features, represented in YAML files

suggest.behat/yii-extension: for integration with Yii web framework

description: Loads environment variables from `.env` to `getenv()`, `$_ENV` and `$_SERVER` automagically.

name: guzzle/guzzle
description: Guzzle is a PHP HTTP client library and framework for building RESTful web service clients

name: behat/mink

suggest.behat/mink-browserkit-driver: extremely fast headless driver for Symfony\Kernel-based apps (Sf2, Silex)
suggest.behat/mink-goutte-driver: fast headless driver for any app without JS emulation

name: rhumsaa/uuid

suggest.doctrine/dbal: Allow the use of a UUID as doctrine field type.
suggest.moontoast/math: Support for converting UUID to 128-bit integer (in string form).
suggest.symfony/console: Support for use of the bin/uuid command line tool.

description: A PHP 5.3+ library for generating RFC 4122 version 1, 3, 4, and 5 universally unique identifiers (UUID).

name: phpunit/php-file-iterator
description: FilterIterator implementation that filters files based on a list of suffixes.

name: phpunit/php-code-coverage
description: Library that provides collection, processing, and rendering functionality for PHP code coverage information.

name: mockery/mockery
description: Mockery is a simple yet flexible PHP mock object framework for use in unit testing with PHPUnit, PHPSpec or any other testing framework. Its core goal is to offer a test double framework with a succint API capable of clearly defining all possible object operations and interactions using a human readable Domain Specific Language (DSL). Designed as a drop in alternative to PHPUnit's phpunit-mock-objects library, Mockery is easy to integrate with PHPUnit and can operate alongside phpunit-mock-objects without the World ending.
